name: beam sword outer casing
description: The outer casing for a Rivtech beam sword.

name: beam sword controls
description: The activation controls for a Rivtech beam sword.

name: beam sword power cell
description: A heavy power cell used to ignite a Rivtech beam sword.

name: beam sword portal conductor
description: The portal field conductor used in a Rivtech beam sword.

name: beam sword vortex ring
description: An extremely delicate yet complex set of interlocking cogs used to help power a Rivtech beam sword.

name: beam sword power insulator
description: A ceramic power shielding unit from a Rivtech beam sword.

name: beam sword energy gate
description: A light absorbing case of shimmering, slow moving liquid used to guide power in Rivtech beam sword.

name: beam sword recharge socket
description: Power connection ports to be installed in a Rivtech beam sword.
